sentences.sContent: "I wish I did," said Phil Jordan, relapsing into his usual gloom.
sentences.sCn: “我要是做了就好了，”菲尔•乔丹说着，回到平时的忧郁中。

synos.tran: [医]复发，再发；故态复萌；回复原状

remMethod.val: re + laps(滑) + e → (身体状况)再次下滑 → 再度恶化

trans.tranCn: 旧病复发； 再度恶化
trans.tranOther: to become ill again after you have seemed to improve
when someone becomes ill again after having seemed to improve
